articles.content: DBrand, known mostly for its skins and cases for mobile devices, has launched its own version of a matte black side plates for the PlayStation 5, going so far as to dare Sony to sue them over it. Unl… [+1834 chars]

articles.author: Bogdan Popa
articles.title: Pioneer Announces Firmware Update with Android Auto Goodies - autoevolution
articles.description: Pioneer is one of the first names drivers turn to when it comes to performing a head unit upgrade in their cars, as the company offers a wide variety of products supposed to fit most vehicles out there.
articles.content: The latest-generation Pioneer head units come with Android Auto and CarPlay support, and some of them even allow wireless connections for added convenience.If you previously encountered any issues wi… [+1609 chars]
